QuestData.Title: The Kunchong Whisperer
QuestData.Description: To really connect with Kovok you need to challenge him mentally and physically. You must respect his strength and intelligence; only then will he allow you to really train him.$b$bThe muckscale tribe may provide an adequate test of his abilities and with you there he shouldn't be in danger.$b$bAdditionally, this will allow us to decrease their numbers in the Briny Muck.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: High oracle to the Muckscale tribe.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Oracle Hiss'ir and 10 Muckscale tribe members.
QuestData.RewardText: I am most impressed with your progress, Wakener. Kovok's training is coming along nicely and he seems to be fond of you.$b$bI have no doubt that you are the best choice to assist me in training him.
